  InnerException: 

Hi

I have a DataGrid with ObservableCollection as a source. Elements in the collection get updated in code-behind in response to external events. Collection receives a Replace event.

Very frequently i am observing the exception below. This problem existed in March edition of DataGrid, so i switched to the latest release - still the same problem.

I marked the following as  [field: NonSerialized]

public event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler CollectionChanged; and public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged; in MultipleCopiesCollection.cs hoping it would resolve the issue.

However it reproes very frequently, I'd say on about 60% of updates

thanks

-----------------------------
